Activity: Log in to the system, check emails. Procrastinate for a bit by checking out some tech blogs related to game development or reading a few articles on the latest advancements in AI.
Refine the acceleration and deceleration of the character, make it smooth and natural.
Look into blending animations so that the transitions between different actions such as moving and jumping are seamlessly integrated.
Research different movement techniques used in popular third-person shooter games (e.g., Gears of War, Uncharted, Tomb Raider).
Focus on cover system movements. Investigate how these games implement cover mechanics and how player movement is affected while in cover.
Specifically analyze games with sliding mechanics like Apex Legends. Check tutorials/blogs regarding these.
Organize the research findings into a document or spreadsheet. Summarize the different movement techniques and their advantages/disadvantages. Note the games where each technique is used effectively.
Commit the changes to the version control system (Git). Write a descriptive commit message explaining the changes made.
